name: clock
description: Current date and time in any timezone. Use so you never say you don't have real-time access for date/time questions.

tools.name: get_current_time
tools.description: Get the current date and time. Use whenever the user asks what time it is, what day/date it is, or current time in a city/timezone. Prefer this over saying you don't have real-time access.

timezone.description: Optional. IANA timezone (e.g. America/Denver, America/New_York, Europe/London, UTC). Omit for system/local time.

format.description: Output style: friendly (e.g. Sunday, Feb 1, 2025 at 3:45 PM), iso (ISO 8601), or short (date + time compact)
